original: Karl Albert, fd. överläkare, Göteborg, f. 1/6/72 i Gbg av stadsdi-str :liäk. Lars August Theoidor W. o. Anna Emfrida Mathàlda Almiberg. G. 10 m. Lida Böving. — Mog:ex. i Gbg 90, med. kand. 96 o. med. lic. 03’ i Upps. E. o. aman. v. a-nat. inst. i Upps. 94-95, v. kir. klin. där 98-99, aman. v. kir. poliklin. 99-00, e. o. assist, o. ob-ducent v. patolog, inst. 00, aman. v. kir. klin. 03’, underkir. där 04, aman. v. Sahligr. sjukh. kir. o. med. avd. 05, tf. andre Häk. v. kir. avd. där 05-06, andre läk. där 06-10, därunder tf. över-läk. tre mån., överläk. v. Ekmanska sjukh. 10-37, prakt. läk. Hobby: filateli. RNO, Hed:L av Gbgs nat. i Upps., Uppl. skytteförb. GM, Skytte-Gm. , Arvid Edvard; kyrkoiherde, Åled,, f. 3ll’/8/89 i Gbg av Edvard W. 0. Alma Holmstedt. G. 27 m. Märtha Olsso^n. Ad ibarn: Gunnel o. Ulla ff. 34. Mog:ex. i Gbg 09, fylln :pr. i latin 14, teol. fil. ex. 14, teol. kand. o. prakt, teol. prov 19, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 20. Tjg. s. pastorsadj. i Morlanda, Örby, Harplinge, v. pastor i Harplinge, Hjär-tum, B olleby gd, Getinge, År stad, Sätila, Eldsberga m. fl samt kyrkoadj. i Forsbälila o. Hjärtum, kyrkob. i Enslöv sed. 41.
translated: Karl Albert, former chief physician, Gothenburg, born on 1/6/72 in Gothenburg, son of city doctor Lars August Theodor W. and Anna Emfrida Mathilda Almiberg. Married on 10/xx with Lida Böving. Completed medical studies in Gothenburg in 1890, obtained Bachelor of Medicine in 1896 and Medical License in 1903 at Uppsala University. Assistant and research fellow at the Anatomy Institute in Uppsala from 1894-1895, at the Surgical Clinic from 1898-1899, at the Surgical Polyclinic from 1899-1900, assistant and assistant autopsy doctor at the Pathology Institute from 1900, assistant at the Surgical Clinic from 1903, assistant at Sahlgr. Hospital in the Surgical and Medical Departments from 1905, Acting Second Assistant at the Surgical Department from 1905-1906, Second Physician from 1906-1910, during which he served as Acting Chief Physician for three months. Chief physician at Ekmanska Hospital from 1910-1937, practicing physician. Hobby: philately. Received Order of the North Star, Medal of Merit from Gothenburg's National in Uppsala, Uppland Rifle Association's Medal, Shooter's Medal. Arvid Edvard, vicar in Åled, born on 31/8/89 in Gothenburg, son of Edvard W. and Alma Holmstedt. Married on 27/xx with Märtha Olsson. They have daughters: Gunnel and Ulla, born in 1934. Completed theological studies in Gothenburg in 1909, Latin proficiency test in 1914, Bachelor of Theology in 1914, completed practical theology exam in 1919, ordained priest in Gothenburg Diocese in 1920. Served as assistant pastor in Morlanda, Örby, Harplinge, pastor in Harplinge, Hjärtum, Bollebyggd, Getinge, Årstads, Sätila, Eldsberga, and others, as well as church adjunct in Forsbäck and Hjärtum, church secretary in Enslöv since 1941.

workExperience.name: Sahlgr. Hospital, Surgical and Medical Departments
